subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Serious need of tech help!
author: Eric VanDuzer
full_text:
Robb,

Any help that I could be please let me know I am not to tech savy.  But I
know enough and if I don't know it I can definitely point you in the right
direction.  Love the show by the way.

Eric
The Paranormal Preacher
evanduzer@...
